name: Feed Frank
description:
Feed Frank is a Halloween take on the basket ball dunking types of games.

You control the witch, who is trying to feed Frank by throwing pumpkins into the pot that he is holding. You get three attempts to get the pumpkin into the pot.

As you level up a few floating bonus items will appear. Collect these for extra points.

This is my submission for micro Studio microjam2 contest.
